property.name: db_path
property.description: Path prefix where the mongodb databases will be stored.

property.name: log_path
property.description: Path where the mongodb databases logs will be stored.

property.name: pid_db_path
property.description: Path where the PID files will be stored.

property.name: mongodb_user
property.description: Mongodb user that will execute the instances

property.name: mongodb_user_group
property.description: Mongodb user group that will execute the instances

property.name: try_interval
property.description: After running all instances the cluster must be automatically configurated. This configuration sets how long (in seconds) we are goin to wait until the instances are up and running to setup then. This is also the wait interval between tries.
property.display-name: Interval to wait before configuring the cluster

property.name: times_to_try
property.description: After running all instances the cluster must be automatically configurated. This configuration sets how many times we will wait until the instances are up and running to setup then.
property.display-name: Times to try to configure the cluster
